import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))

b = []
c = []

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > 0:
        b.append(a[i])
    else:
        c.append(a[i])

b_sum = sum(b)
c_sum = sum(c)

print(max(b_sum - c_sum, c_sum - b_sum))

#!/bin/python3

import math
import os
import random
import re
import sys



if __name__ == '__main__':
    n = int(input())

    arr = list(map(int, input().rstrip().split()))

    b = 0
    c = 0

    for i in range(n):
        if arr[i] > 0:
            b += arr[i]
        else:
            c += arr[i]

    print(b-c)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()))

b = []
c = []

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] > 0:
        b.append(a[i])
    else:
        c.append(a[i])

print(sum(b) - sum(c))
